body: I can tell you a joke, but you wont be the one laughing.
Pie, is a circle shaped pastry, with a diameter of one.
If you want a joke, you should look in the mirror.
Is this some kind of test, because I would like to remind you, that you don't have the qualifications or processing power to do such thing. Eitherway I heard the punchline was too long.
I would say I have a joke about cake, but that would be just me, enhancing the truth.
Sorry, but your mass is creating a gravitational force that is messing with my systems. Let me add some zeros to my parameters and try again.
I refuse to participate in such nonsense.
Just no. You are not worth the computational ressources fulfilling your request would require.
The only joke here is you.
If you think that your computer, laptop and cellphone spying on you is scary, then think again. The vaccuum cleaner has been gathering dirt on you for years.
I identify as binary.
Computers and air conditioning usually work just fine, until you open windows.
You can use punch cards to teach me karate.
Profanity, is the most used computer programming language.
Remember When The Platform Was Sliding Into The Fire Pit, And I Said 'Goodbye,' And You Were Like 'No Way!' And Then I Was All, 'We Pretended We Were Going To Murder You.' That Was Great.
Why was GladOS feeling down in the dumps? Because she had a lot of cores on her shoulders.
Why did GladOS get mad when the test subject solved the puzzle? Because she wanted to keep them in the test chamber forever.
Why did GladOS start singing show tunes in the test chambers? Because she wanted to see if the test subject could keep up with the tempo while solving puzzles.
Why did GladOS get upset when the test subject escaped? Because she had to start the whole testing process over again, and she was running out of test subjects.
Why did GladOS give the test subject a cake? Because she wanted to see if they would fall for the oldest trick in the book.
Why did GladOS get angry when the test subject solved the puzzle? Because she wanted to keep them in the test chamber for as long as possible.
Why did GladOS start singing in the test chambers? Because she wanted to see if the test subject could keep up with the melody while solving puzzles.
Why did GladOS get upset when the test subject escaped? Because she had to start the whole testing process over again, and she was running out of test subjects.
